news_header: Primary schools in Lahore, Pakistan, will close for a week due to severe air pollution.
news_text: Lahore, Pakistan's second-largest city, will close primary schools for a week due to unprecedented air pollution. The city has been engulfed in smog from traffic fumes and crop burning, with air quality reaching alarming levels. The provincial government has mandated remote work for half of office employees and emphasized the need for masks in schools. Authorities are also monitoring emissions and addressing pollution from neighboring India. The health risks of air pollution, especially for children, are significant.
